roleset.name: analyze for one or more specific components

role.descr: process, substance (analyte), or property of such process or substance that is being assayed

example.name: example with measured property
example.text: To this end we assayed human mononuclear phagocytes for their ability to be stimulated by hFX-armored HAd5.
example.arg: the ability of human mononuclear phagocytes to be stimulated by hFX-armored HAd5

example.name: example with instrument
example.text: The activity was assayed with glycyl-dehydrophenylalanine as described in Materials and Methods.
